name: Eidolon Rekindled (Prototype)
description: Eidolon Rekindled is a top-down arena fighting game where you control an Eidolon, an animated puppet that can be modified in various ways to change their play style with different attachable limbs. We've been working on for the past few months but we're releasing it as a prototype to showcase our work so far in the project. The majority of the important features are present in the game, however it lacks in content.
